sentences.en: He was inconsolable after his pet died.
sentences.cn: 宠物死了之后,他万分沮丧.

sentences.en: The boy was inconsolable after the death of his dog.
sentences.cn: 男孩因为自己的狗死了而伤心不已。

sentences.en: The children were inconsolable when their father died.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子因丧父而悲伤不已.

sentences.en: The little girl was inconsolable at the loss of her kitten.
sentences.cn: 这个小女孩因为丢失了她的小猫而极度伤心.

sentences.en: They were inconsolable when their only child died.
sentences.cn: 他们唯一的孩子去世时，他们简直痛不欲生。

sentences.en: Though both parents grieved, his little mother was inconsolable.
sentences.cn: 鸟爸爸和鸟妈妈都很难过, 然而小鸟妈妈却伤心至极.

sentences.en: Turner's friends said he was inconsolable.
sentences.cn: 特纳的朋友说,他伤心至极.

sentences.en: When my mother died I was inconsolable.
sentences.cn: 母亲去世的时候，我悲恸万分。

trans.tran_en: so sad that it is impossible for anyone to comfort you
